They want to expand their audience to include positivity, and a modern, empowering approach to some seriously progressive modern tech in the health & wellness / mental performance industry.So they're developing some promotional videos, alongside a big website transformation, to develop brand recognition and new brand awareness, showing off a new look through a simple, general video about the practice and how they help people.They're interested in minimalism, simplicity, and something pretty fun and connective. They like Apple and Oscar Health insurance - both progressive and innovative, and pioneers in an industry, just like they are in theirs.The ProjectA promotional video, with several more to come. desc: We firmly believe that if it's not right for the Customers, it's not right for the company, and we are so proud to be part of creating a system with such integrity.The best experienced things in life are shared by people talking to other people, and that’s exactly what our App users do every day. Shopoholicx is a price comparison site/App, which makes it easy for people to find the best price of a product or services that anyone is looking for to meet their individual needs and maintain a lifestyle. Together we will be helping hundreds and thousands of people to save ‘Time and Money’ on their everyday shopping.Shopoholicx has developed a tremendous concept as a tool to help you save ‘time and money’ on products and services that you buy and use every day. In addition, we give people around, the ability to build a part-time or full-time business by showing others how to save time and money.Shopoholicx empowers the consumers with maximum information about the products to provide the best shopping experience which helps them save Time and Money. It shows detailed specifications about the product, product pictures, features, offers, reviews & rating (of actual buyers from affiliate partners) and price comparison shopping along with cash back to enable online shoppers take smart buying decisions.Shopoholicx has specifically focused on e-Commerce and m-commerce to revolutionize the way an average people interact with it - changing hundreds & thousands of people from pure consumers to active participants who can now earn a viable income from this shifting shopping trends.Shopoholicx is a "Think beyond cash back" concept… Because these savings & earnings are over and above any existing coupon or discount that the affiliate Partner’s offer. The savings & earnings are computed on the commission received on Actual Price paid on the affiliate Partner’s site. The savings & earnings are accumulated in your Shopoholicx wallet account and can be transferred into your Bank account or redeemed on next purchase in the permissible capacity.Without specialized knowledge or experience in modern day online business world… We are opening doors to masses by introducing & combining the world of e-commerce & human interaction at one place to fuel the growth of this revolutionary concept. Because in this age of social networking, direct sharing is a strategy that can often be more effective than traditional advertising or securing premium retail shelf space. Rather we call it Recommendation Marketing. It allows anyone to build an independent business with low startup and overhead costs. You connect people with the products & concept, and we fill their orders and provide quality customer service.Shopoholicx will reward you for sharing our products & concept with [url removed, login to view] shopoholicx.. we are creating the economy of the future.Shopoholicx has developed a tremendous concept as a tool to help you save 'time and money' on products & services that you buy and use every day. We allow people to build a part-time or full time business, simply by shopping & sharing with others about how to save time and money on the products and brands they already 'know', 'love' & 'trust'..We are the first to introduce a system which is a handshake between online shopping &  traditional business with a touch of Referral marketing.Not only, You can get paid on the people you refer but also on the people referred by your referral.. to unlimited levels.And the best thing is that its FREE to participate.

desc: Physics-Based Motion Control SystemDescription: Implement a system to generate the motions of rigid bodies using physical principles. Include the effect of gravity and collision between objects. You may make some simple approximations for rotational dynamics. For collisions, reflect the velocity. Collision detection becomes easy if you consider a bounding sphere of the objects in the scene.Input:a) Geometric data for a number of objectsb) Physical properties of the objects (e.g. mass, moment of inertia, friction, coefficient of restitution)c) Initial conditionsOutput: Animated view of a bunch of objects colliding with each other and the floor.Deliverables:a) A description of your system (short documentation) that will make it easier to understand your code. b) The source code.
title: Physics-Based Motion Control System

desc: Hi, I have troubles with some 6k 3d360 Videoclips. I shot sevral videos in a hotel. Every shot was done with two exposure settings, so the room and the view out of the window was well lit.
